detaileddescription.para: matrix pin a
matrix pin b
matrix pin c
matrix pin clk
matrix pin lat
matrix pin oe

briefdescription.para: Stores the track positions. Order: track_position, x, y.
Stores the players individual home Positions. Order: player_nr, token_nr, x/y.
Stores the players individual finish Positions. Order: player_nr, token_nr, x/y.
Stores the smiley for the winner animation.
Stores the Players Colors. Order: player_nr, bright/dark Initital values are blue, green, yellow, red. Values can be changed using the Set_Colors method.

detaileddescription.para: current blink mode
current blink counter. Will count down to determine how many blink_clycles are left.
current blink type, determines what is blinking
he number of the player to blink.
The number of the second player to blink. Used in token, if occupied flag is set and in display for the second color.
old position to blink in token mode
new position to blink in token mode
stores if we are currently in the on or off phase

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t _u8_matrix_a, uint8_t u8_matrix_b, uint8_t u8_matrix_c, uint8_t u8_matrix_clk, uint8_t u8_lat, uint8_t u8_matrix_oe)
memberdef.name: cla_display

briefdescription.para: Set the Colors of the player.

parameterdescription.para: Number of the Player (0:3)
Bright Color for the Player
Dark Color for the Player

detaileddescription.para: This function must be called ONCE at the beginning of the Code

briefdescription.para: Display the Players all in home.

detaileddescription.para: This method is supposed to be called when setting the Game up. It displays the number of players that are currently chosen.

parameterdescription.para: The number of Players to be displayed.

detaileddescription.para: This method can display the current player on the matrix.

parameterdescription.para: The number of the current player.
Tokens at home, signaled by the bit position (1 << tokennr -> token is home). default: -1 (don't animate)

briefdescription.para: Display the Progress This method can display the progress of the Player.

parameterdescription.para: The number of the current player.
The progress of the player. (0:28)
The first letter of the word to display. default: ' '
The second letter of the word to display. default: ' '

briefdescription.para: clears the right half of the display.

memberdef.argsstring: (en_blink_mode _en_blink_mode, int8_t _i8_blink_cycles, en_blink_type _en_blink_type, uint8_t _u8_blink_player_number, int8_t _i8_blink_second_player, uint8_t _u8_new_position=0, bool _bool_occupied_flag=true, uint8_t _u8_old_position=0)
memberdef.name: Blink_Start

detaileddescription.para:
This method can blink
a token to display possible Progress (token)
two tokens alternating in the color of two players (token_thrown)

parameterdescription.para: The mode of the blinking (fast/slow/off)
The number of cycles to blink (-1: infinite)
The type of the blinking (token/token_thrown/starting_square/winner_animation)
The number of the player to blink.
The number of the second player to blink.
new position of the token. default: 0. Different use in case of blink_type starting_square: Tokens at home, signaled by the bit position (1 << tokennr -> token is home).
flag used in token mode to determine the color to alternate the new position to. default: true
old position of the token. default: 0
flag to determine if the function is called from an interupt service routine.

simplesect.para: true if the Blinking wasn't executed due to it possibly taking too long.
true if blinking is on, false otherwise

detaileddescription.para: This method can move a token.

parameterdescription.para: chosen player
old position of the token
new position of the token

detaileddescription.para: Display the Dice on the matrix. when Set to animate, it will play a small animation. The animation uses a simple delay instead of interupts, since the program is not supposed to keep running while the animation is played.

parameterdescription.para: The value to be displayed.
The number of the current roll.
The number of the current player.
flag to determine if the dice should be animated. should be handled with care as it uses Delay. default: true

detaileddescription.para: This class handles all the functions and parameters needed to display the game.
